summary: A young man realizes that he has to push back against his domineering father if he wants to find true happiness and love.
cast: Siddharth|Genelia D'Souza|Prakash Raj|Srinivasa Rao Kota|Jayasudha|Dharmavarapu Subramanyam|Suneel|Brahmanandam|Tanikella Bharani|Neha Bamb|Murali Mohan|Chitram Seenu|Ravi Varma|Surekha Vani|Satya Krishnan|Chalapathi Rao|Narsing Yadav|Saira Bhanu|Sudeepa|Vijaya Sai|Srikanth Addala|Sapthagiri|Stunt Silva
title: Bommarillu
